name.description: The name of the launch template. Must be unique in the AWS account and region.

default_version.description: Default version of the launch template

update_default_version.description: Whether to update the default version of the launch template

image_id.description: ID of the AMI to use for the instance

ebs_optimized.description: Whether the instance is EBS optimized

tags.description: Tags to apply to the launch template

user_data.description: Base64-encoded user data for the instance

vpc_security_group_ids.description: List of security group IDs for VPC

capacity_reservation_specification.type: list(object({capacity_reservation_preference: string, capacity_reservation_target: list(object({capacity_reservation_id: string, capacity_reservation_resource_group_arn: string}))}))

cpu_options.description: The CPU options for the launch template

credit_specification.description: CPU specifications for the launch template

elastic_gpu_specifications.description: The Elastic GPU to attach to the instance.

elastic_inference_accelerator.description: The Elastic Inference Accelerator to attach to the instance.

instance_market_options.type: list(object({market_type: string, spot_options: list(object({block_duration_minutes: number, instance_interruption_behavior: string, max_price: string, spot_instance_type: string, valid_until: string}))}))

license_specification.description: The license configuration to associate with the instance.

metadata_options.type: list(object({http_endpoint: string, http_protocol_ipv6: string, http_put_response_hop_limit: number, http_tokens: string, instance_metadata_tags: string}))

network_interfaces.type: list(object({associate_carrier_ip_address: string, associate_public_ip_address: string, delete_on_termination: string, description: string, device_index: number, interface_type: string, ipv4_address_count: number, ipv4_addresses: list(string), ipv4_prefix_count: number, ipv4_prefixes: list(string), ipv6_address_count: number, ipv6_addresses: list(string), ipv6_prefix_count: number, ipv6_prefixes: list(string), network_card_index: number, network_interface_id: string, private_ip_address: string, security_groups: list(string), subnet_id: string}))
network_interfaces.description: Network interface configuration for the instance

placement.type: list(object({affinity: string, availability_zone: string, group_name: string, host_id: string, host_resource_group_arn: string, partition_number: number, spread_domain: string, tenancy: string}))

private_dns_name_options.description: Private DNS name options for the instance

tag_specifications.description: Tags to apply to resources during launch

block_device_mappings.type: list(object({device_name: string, no_device: string, virtual_name: string, ebs: list(object({delete_on_termination: string, encrypted: string, iops: number, kms_key_id: string, snapshot_id: string, throughput: number, volume_size: number, volume_type: string}))}))
block_device_mappings.description: Block device mapping configuration for the launch template
